mapper.select: SELECT A.EMNO, A.EMNAME, A.EMID, A.EMPW, A.EMHIREDATE, A.DEPTCD, B.DEPTNAME, A.JOBCD, C.JOBNAME, A.EMEMAIL, A.EMHP, A.EMDINO, A.EMEXNO, A.EMSIGN, A.EMINSERTDATE, A.EMUPDATEDATE FROM EM_INFO A, EM_DEPARTMENT B, EM_JOB C WHERE A.EMID = #{emid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EMPW = #{empw, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DEPTCD = B.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD = C.JOBCD

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_LINENO,-4)) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_LINENO,-4))+1) END EA_LINENO FROM EA_LINE A WHERE SUBSTR(A.EA_LINENO,4,8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_STEPNO,-4)) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_STEPNO,-4))+1) END EA_STEPNO FROM EA_STEP A WHERE SUBSTR(A.EA_STEPNO,7,8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_LOGNO,-4)) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_LOGNO,-4))+1) END EA_LOGNO FROM EA_LOG A WHERE SUBSTR(A.EA_LOGNO,6,8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_NO,-4)) IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(1) ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX(SUBSTR(A.EA_NO,-4))+1) END EA_NO FROM EA_TABLE A WHERE SUBSTR(A.EA_NO,3,8) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EA_LINE ( EA_LINENO ,EA_LINENAME ) VALUES ( #{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --결재라인번호 ,#{ea_linename, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --결재라인명 )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.DEPTCD DEPTCD ,B.DEPTNAME DEPTNAME FROM EM_INFO A ,EM_DEPARTMENT B WHERE A.DEPTCD=B.DEPTCD
SELECT DISTINCT A.JOBCD JOBCD ,B.JOBNAME JOBNAME FROM EM_JOB B ,EM_INFO A ,EM_DEPARTMENT C WHERE A.JOBCD=B.JOBCD AND A.DEPTCD=C.DEPTCD AND C.DEPTCD=#{deptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.EMNAME EMNAME ,A.EMNO EMNO ,A.JOBCD JOBCD ,A.DEPTCD DEPTCD ,B.DEPTNAME DEPTNAME ,C.JOBNAME JOBNAME FROM EM_INFO A ,EM_DEPARTMENT B ,EM_JOB C WHERE A.DEPTCD=B.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND A.JOBCD=#{jobcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 선택된 JOBNAME으로 조건이 바뀜 AND A.DEPTCD=#{deptcd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 선택된 DEPTNAME으로 조건이 바뀜
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EA_LOG ( EA_FINALDATE ,EA_LOGNO ,EA_LINENO ,EA_STEPNO ,EA_NO ,EA_STATUS ,EA_SIGN ,EA_SIGN1 ,EA_SIGN2 ) VALUES ( SYSDATE ,#{ea_logno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,'01' ,(SELECT A.EMSIGN FROM EM_INFO A WHERE A.EMNO=(SELECT B.EA_EMPNO FROM EA_STEP B WHERE B.EA_LINENO=#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ,'NULL' ,'NULL' )
mapper.select: SELECT B.* ,C.* ,G.EMNAME EMNAME FROM (SELECT A.* FROM EA_TABLE A WHERE A.EA_NEXTEMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_STATUS IN('01','02', '05') ORDER BY A.EA_INSERTDATE DESC)B ,EA_LOG C ,(SELECT D.* FROM EM_INFO D, EA_TABLE E, EA_LOG F WHERE D.EMNO=E.EA_EMPNO AND EA_NEXTEMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND E.EA_LOGNO=F.EA_LOGNO AND ROWNUM='1' ORDER BY E.EA_NO DESC)G WHERE C.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM( (SELECT A.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,A.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND A.EA_STATUS IN ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '06', '07'))) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,TO_CHAR(A.EA_FINALDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('04')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,TO_CHAR(A.EA_FINALDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('01', '02')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,TO_CHAR(A.EA_FINALDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EA_FINALDATE ,TO_CHAR(B.EA_INSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,B.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EA_LOG A ,EA_TABLE B ,(SELECT C.EMNAME EMNAME FROM EM_INFO C WHERE C.EMNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) C WHERE B.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (B.EA_STATUS IN('05')) ORDER BY B.EA_INSERTDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT A.EA_DOCCD EA_DOCCD ,A.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,A.EA_NO EA_NO ,A.EA_SUBJECT EA_SUBJECT ,A.EA_MEMO EA_MEMO ,A.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,A.EACNO EACNO ,A.EADRAFTCONTANT EADRAFTCONTANT ,A.EA_INSERTDATE EA_INSERTDATE ,B.EA_FINALDATE EA_FINALDATE ,B.EA_LOGNO EA_LOGNO ,B.EA_LINENO EA_LINENO ,B.EA_STEPNO EA_STEPNO ,A.EA_STATUS EA_STATUS ,B.EA_SIGN EA_SIGN ,B.EA_SIGN1 EA_SIGN1 ,B.EA_SIGN2 EA_SIGN2 ,C.EMNAME EMNAME ,C.EA_EMPNO EA_EMPNO ,C.JOBCD JOBCD ,C.JOBNAME JOBNAME ,C.DEPTCD DEPTCD ,C.DEPTNAME DEPTNAME ,D.EMNAME1 EMNAME1 ,D.EA_EMPNO1 EA_EMPNO1 ,D.JOBCD1 JOBCD1 ,D.JOBNAME1 JOBNAME1 ,D.DEPTCD1 DEPTCD1 ,D.DEPTNAME1 DEPTNAME1 ,E.EMNAME2 EMNAME2 ,E.EA_EMPNO2 EA_EMPNO2 ,E.JOBCD2 JOBCD2 ,E.JOBNAME2 JOBNAME2 ,E.DEPTCD2 DEPTCD2 ,E.DEPTNAME2 DEPTNAME2 FROM EA_TABLE A ,EA_LOG B ,(SELECT A.EMNAME AS EMNAME ,B.EA_EMPNO AS EA_EMPNO ,A.JOBCD AS JOBCD ,A.DEPTCD AS DEPTCD ,C.JOBNAME AS JOBNAME ,D.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME FROM EM_INFO A ,EA_STEP B ,EM_JOB C ,EM_DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.EMNO=B.EA_EMPNO AND A.DEPTCD=D.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})C ,(SELECT A.EMNAME AS EMNAME1 ,B.EA_EMPNO1 AS EA_EMPNO1 ,A.JOBCD AS JOBCD1 ,A.DEPTCD AS DEPTCD1 ,C.JOBNAME AS JOBNAME1 ,D.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME1 FROM EM_INFO A ,EA_STEP B ,EM_JOB C ,EM_DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.EMNO=B.EA_EMPNO1 AND A.DEPTCD=D.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})D ,(SELECT A.EMNAME AS EMNAME2 ,B.EA_EMPNO2 AS EA_EMPNO2 ,A.JOBCD AS JOBCD2 ,A.DEPTCD AS DEPTCD2 ,C.JOBNAME AS JOBNAME2 ,D.DEPTNAME AS DEPTNAME2 FROM EM_INFO A ,EA_STEP B ,EM_JOB C ,EM_DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.EMNO=B.EA_EMPNO2 AND A.DEPTCD=D.DEPTCD AND A.JOBCD=C.JOBCD AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})E WHERE A.EA_NO=#{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.EA_LOGNO=B.EA_LOGNO AND (C.EA_EMPNO=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR D.EA_EMPNO1=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR E.EA_EMPNO2=#{emno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EA_LOG ( EA_NO ,EA_LOGNO ,EA_STEPNO ,EA_LINENO ,EA_FINALDATE ,EA_STATUS ,EA_SIGN ,EA_SIGN1 ,EA_SIGN2 ) VALUES ( #{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ea_logno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,SYSDATE ,#{ea_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,(SELECT A.EMSIGN FROM EM_INFO A WHERE A.EMNO=(SELECT B.EA_EMPNO FROM EA_STEP B WHERE B.EA_LINENO=#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ,(SELECT A.EMSIGN FROM EM_INFO A WHERE A.EMNO=(SELECT B.EA_EMPNO1 FROM EA_STEP B WHERE B.EA_LINENO=#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ,null )
mapper.update: UPDATE EA_TABLE A SET A.EA_LOGNO=#{ea_logno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --로그번호 ,A.EA_STATUS=#{ea_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 결재문서상태 ,A.EA_NEXTEMNO=#{ea_nextemno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} -- 다음 결재자 설정 WHERE A.EA_NO=#{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --전자결재번호
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EA_LOG ( EA_FINALDATE ,EA_LOGNO ,EA_LINENO ,EA_STEPNO ,EA_NO ,EA_STATUS ,EA_SIGN ,EA_SIGN1 ,EA_SIGN2 ) VALUES ( SYSDATE --EA_FINALDATE ,#{ea_logno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --로그번호(채번. 변화해야하는 부분) ,#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --결재LINE번호 ,#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --결재STEP코드 ,#{ea_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --전자결재번호 ,#{ea_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR} --바뀌어야하는 부분. 1차= 승인, 2차=최종승인 ,(SELECT A.EMSIGN FROM EM_INFO A WHERE A.EMNO=(SELECT B.EA_EMPNO FROM EA_STEP B WHERE B.EA_LINENO=#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ,(SELECT A.EMSIGN FROM EM_INFO A WHERE A.EMNO=(SELECT B.EA_EMPNO1 FROM EA_STEP B WHERE B.EA_LINENO=#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) ,(SELECT A.EMSIGN FROM EM_INFO A WHERE A.EMNO=(SELECT B.EA_EMPNO2 FROM EA_STEP B WHERE B.EA_LINENO=#{ea_lineno, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.EA_STEPNO=#{ea_stepno, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) )
